entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow late this morning and this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
